subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say that Jerry Sandusky, a former Penn State assistant coach, continued to abuse boys after Coach Joe Paterno was told of an allegation against Sandusky in 2002.
snippet: Prosecutors say that Jerry Sandusky, a former Penn State assistant coach, continued to abuse boys after Coach Joe Paterno was told of an allegation against Sandusky in 2002.
